casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shawn Germaine FRALEY 407P13-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 9, 2019 Sherri Horner Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Shawn Germaine Fraley, for Fraley, Shawn Germaine. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of August 2019 by Defendant for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of September 2019."

Ervin and Davis, J. recused
